sentences.en: He claimed the housing market was showing signs of a revival.
sentences.cn: 他指出房地产市场正出现复苏的迹象.

sentences.en: He toured South Africa organizing revival meetings.
sentences.cn: 他游历南非，组织奋兴布道会。

sentences.en: I think there'll be a big revival of building this year.
sentences.cn: 我想今年建筑业大有好转.

sentences.en: In 1975 he portrayed the king in a Los Angeles revival of "Camelot".
sentences.cn: 他1975年在洛杉矶重新上演的剧目《卡米洛》中扮演国王。

sentences.en: It was again influential in the revival of the arts in Germany after 1945.
sentences.cn: 它在1945年以后德国的艺术复兴中又重新得势.

sentences.en: The period saw a great revival in the wine trade.
sentences.cn: 这一时期葡萄酒业出现了很大的复苏.

sentences.en: The revival of the railway service will be immensely beneficial for the speedy movement of passengers and cargo.
sentences.cn: 铁路运输的复兴对加快客货运送大有助益.

sentences.en: The signs of an economic revival are only just beginning.
sentences.cn: 经济复苏的迹象刚刚开始显现。

sentences.en: The US and the UK have expectations of economic revival.
sentences.cn: 美国和英国对经济复苏有所期待。

sentences.en: There are encouraging signs of an artistic revival.
sentences.cn: 出现了鼓舞人心的艺术复兴的迹象。

sentences.en: There had been a steady revival of interest in Melville's work.
sentences.cn: 对梅尔维尔作品的兴趣逐渐恢复.

sentences.en: This method is now undergoing a slow revival.
sentences.cn: 目前这种方法正在慢慢复兴.

sentences.en: This property has led to a revival of interest in celluloid.
sentences.cn: 赛璐珞的这一特性,使它再度受到了注意.

sentences.en: This return to realism has produced a revival of interest in a number of artists.
sentences.cn: 这种重回现实主义的趋势已经重新激起了人们对许多艺术家的兴趣。

sentences.en: World trade is showing signs of revival.
sentences.cn: 世界贸易正显示出重新活跃的征兆.

words.tran_cn: 信仰复兴运动；复兴倾向
领导宗教复兴运动的人；复旧者
使复活，使恢复（revive的过去式）
复兴；复活；苏醒；恢复精神
使复兴；使苏醒；回想起；重演，重播
使再生，使复活；使振奋精神
复兴；复活；苏醒；恢复精神；再生效

phrases.tran_cn: n. 文艺复兴（Revival of Letters或Revival of Literature）

trans.tran_cn: 复活，再生，再流行，再生效，复兴，（老戏多年后）重新上演
trans.tran_en: a process in which something becomes active or strong again
